page.title: 13PLANT,ROADS & AIRFIELDS
page.content: driving licence. The course lasts for 22 weeks,six weeks is spent on theory and the rest on learning how to operate and maintain approximately five of the plant vehicles. After about two years with his unit a soldier returns to PR&A to take his next course(P.O.M.2-1). This course lasts for 9 weeks, one week on management,four weeks learning to use four more machines and then four weeks in Cambridgeshire completing a project During a soldiers career he may return numerous times to PR&A on courses varying in length from one week to fifty-six weeks. He could possibly learn to operate as many as twenty different machines but generally 12 is the norm. In addition he may also learn to use Engineer Construction Plant such as cement mixers,pavers and road rollers.
